tool_description: An API to find out email is true
name: Truemail
title: Truemail

api_list.name: Get the status of email
api_list.description: This API will return is email id is really exists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://truemail.p.rapidapi.com/email/nishant@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://truemail.p.rapidapi.com/email/{emailadd}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
